mapper.select:
SELECT to_char (sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS kcdate, a.wareid AS wareid, b.warename AS warename, ( SELECT factoryname FROM t_factory WHERE factoryid = c.factoryid ) AS factoryname, b.warespec AS warespec, b.wareunit AS wareunit, c.makeno AS makeno, c.invalidate AS invalidate, a.wareqty AS wareqty, c.purprice as purprice, (a.wareqty * c.purprice) as money, 1 AS kxstate FROM t_store_d a LEFT JOIN t_store_i c ON a.wareid = c.wareid AND a.batid = c.batid AND a.compid = c.compid
AND c.ownerid<>101
LEFT JOIN t_Ware b ON a.wareid = b.wareid AND a.compid = b.compid WHERE a.wareid IN ( SELECT wareid FROM t_ware_class_base WHERE classgroupno = '54' AND classcode = #{classcode} AND compid = 1 ) AND a.compid = 1 AND c.invalidate IS NOT NULL AND a.wareqty <> 0
